message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product. I think you'll love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit too high for my budget.  Would you consider $8,500?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I'm afraid $8,500 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. How about we settle on $11,000?
I understand you're looking for a fair price, Alice. How about we split the difference again and settle on $9,750?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. However, I'm still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but this time I'll give you a bit more. How about we settle on $10,500?
Alice, it seems we are getting closer.  To be fair, I'll meet you in the middle again. How about $10,125?
I think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $10,750?
This is a tough one, Alice, but I'm willing to come up a bit more.  How about $10,437.50?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one final concession. How about we meet at $10,625?
